about_the_game:
After a long day at work, you're ready to head home. But as you step outside, time rewinds, pulling you back into the office. Everything on your desk is untouched, and your colleagues remain in place as if nothing happened. What's going on? Is this a dream? With each loop, the office begins to change...

  • Deepening Layers of Fear:

From scattered files to faint ghostly figures, the office evolves with every loop.

  • Enemies from Time:

Face off against monsters with clocks on their backs—where do they come from?

  • Mind-Bending Puzzles:

Solve intricate riddles to uncover the truth behind the time loops and escape the infinite cycle.

Dive into this thrilling adventure where every loop brings new horrors and challenges. Will you unravel the puzzle of time, or remain trapped in the office forever?

This game is created by @watase with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

name: Time's Abyss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: You're trapped in the office! Every time you leave, time resets and you find yourself back in the office. What secrets lie within the time loop, and can you successfully escape the office?
